alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Geneva (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 5:18AM CDT until May 06 at 6:15AM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Coffee County in southeastern Alabama... Western Geneva County in southeastern Alabama... West central Bay County in the Panhandle of Florida... Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... Western Holmes County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southwestern Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 615 AM CDT. * At 518 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles east of Georgiana to near McKenzie to near Red Level to 10 miles southwest of River Falls to 17 miles west of Lockhart to 7 miles west of Laurel Hill to near Crestview to near Navarre Beach, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Panama City Beach, Elba, Santa Rosa Beach, De Funiak Springs, Geneva, Enterprise, Fort Rucker, Samson, New Brockton, Eglin Air Force Base, Lee, Union, Liberty, Live Oak, Freeport, Paxton, Ponce De Leon, Kinston, Westville and Ebro. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
